io.senseai.kelvinsdk

Enum OperatingMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<OperatingMode>
      • io.senseai.kelvinsdk.OperatingMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<OperatingMode>

    public enum OperatingMode
extends java.lang.Enum<OperatingMode>
    Enum that defines the allowable modes of operation of the SDK.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      CONTINUOUS
      SDK will always be running in this mode.
      OFF
      SDK will stop all background services, location collection and alarms when set to this mode.
      TIMER
      SDK will set an alarm and wakeup and make and predictions at a frequency defined by a value in the Sense Ai developer portal.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • CONTINUOUS

        public static final OperatingMode CONTINUOUS
        SDK will always be running in this mode. A Service is started that will run continuously and restart itself if the client application is killed. The SDK will make predictions every 40 seconds when in this mode and will refresh location data every 5 minutes

      • TIMER

        public static final OperatingMode TIMER
        SDK will set an alarm and wakeup and make and predictions at a frequency defined by a value in the Sense Ai developer portal. This frequency can range from 3 to 15 minutes but defaults to 15 minutes. The SDK will wake up and will require 40 seconds before a prediction can be made. Once the prediction is made the SDK will go back to sleep and stay sleeping until the alarm fires again or the mode is changed. Location data will be refreshed every 15 minutes in this mode.

      • OFF

        public static final OperatingMode OFF
        SDK will stop all background services, location collection and alarms when set to this mode.
